title: Caring for pets
context: Discuss feeding, walking, or maintaining a household pet.

content.bestLine: I need to feed my dog now

neutral.text: What's the best food for cats?
I walk my dog every morning
How often should I clean the litter box?
What's a good schedule for feeding my pet?
I need to take my dog to the vet
How can I keep my pet healthy?
I'm looking for a pet groomer

informal.text: I'm gonna feed my pup now
I'm taking my dog for a walk
My pet's gotta get some exercise
What's the best way to care for my pet?
I need to get my dog to the park
My pet's hungry, I gotta feed it
I'm gonna give my pet a bath

formal.text: It is essential to provide my pet with adequate nutrition
I must ensure my pet receives regular veterinary care
Maintaining a clean and safe environment for my pet is crucial
I am responsible for providing my pet with a balanced diet
It is my duty to care for my pet's physical and emotional needs
I must establish a routine for feeding and exercising my pet

dialogs.description: Conversation between pet owner and veterinarian

lines.speaker: Pet Owner
lines.text: What's the best food for my cat?

lines.speaker: Veterinarian
lines.text: I recommend a high-quality commercial cat food

lines.speaker: Pet Owner 1
lines.text: I'm taking my dog for a walk

lines.speaker: Pet Owner 2
lines.text: That's great, my dog needs exercise too
